name: Ask Your Team
description: AskYourTeam is the employee experience platform with a difference. We put your needs front and centre, taking the time to truly understand your unique challenges and needs to deliver the outcomes you want.  We help to drive sustainable productivity, improve leader performance, create happier, safer more inclusive cultures, and offer the tailored support you need to make the biggest impact. Based in New Zealand and Australia, working globally, within organisations or supply chains.
business_objectives: Accelerate Skill Development and Learning Efficiency
Headline: We help organisations to enhance performance and wellbeing.
ShortDescription: Driving the change you need is easier with the right partner by your side.

Highlights.name: Customer-focused
Highlights.description: We define success uniquely for you, providing precise tools to meet your needs.

Highlights.name: Expert guidance
Highlights.description: Skilled team ensures real results in productivity and wellbeing.

Highlights.name: Actionable insights
Highlights.description: We pinpoint key improvements with easy tools and expert guidance.

enhanced_description: AskYourTeam is an employee experience platform that focuses on understanding and addressing an organization's unique challenges to deliver desired outcomes. It is designed to drive sustainable productivity, improve leader performance, and create happier, safer, and more inclusive cultures, ultimately enhancing overall performance and wellbeing. The platform is highly customer-focused, offering customized, not complicated, solutions with expert guidance to provide actionable insights where they matter most. Operating globally from New Zealand and Australia, Ask Your Team supports organizations of all sizes, including those within supply chains.
key_use_cases: Creating happier, safer, and more inclusive cultures
competitive_advantages: Provides direction where it matters most
Customer-focused: defines success uniquely for each client, providing precise tools
Expert guidance: skilled team ensures real results in productivity and wellbeing
Actionable insights: pinpoints key improvements with easy tools and expert guidance
roi_benefits: Happier, safer, and more inclusive cultures
